medium: 146 political badges of various shapes and sizes pinned on a T-shirt with a silkscreened image of Mao Zedong in pigtails by Zhang Hongtu
dimensions: badge: diam. 7.5 cm. (2 15/16 in.); overall: ca. 77 x ca. 90 cm. (30 5/16 x 35 7/16 in.)

texts.textentryhtml:
Round, 7.5 cm. diam. high-relief, gold (but rubbing off) Mao offset towards top, agst a red bkgd with starburst pattern with broader, plain bands in between.  Building with marble pailou & 5 bridges to left side and a lg lantern to the right, all superimposed on an outline of China.  Inscription on the front of the building: L: “中华人民共…” [?] ; R: “世界人民…[da tan?]” Background (red) décor: R: highrise horizontal baner at base with “[?] 一周年”; L: proclamation/sheet of paper with: “公司念詐[?]”.
Back: lg, deep indentation. Lots of tool marks on back.  All inscriptions = cruder than others seen so far (carved in freehand? May still be stamped/molded).  “成耐厂/革委会平反纪念/1969.3.23”.  
CONDITION: red & gold layers chipping/flaking at the front edge
–2009 Collection of Zhang Hongtu (Woodside, NY), by gift to the Princeton University Art Museum, 2009.

caption: Chinese, Modern period (1912–present), Mao badge, 3/23/1969. 146 political badges of various shapes and sizes pinned on a T-shirt with a silkscreened image of Mao Zedong in pigtails by Zhang Hongtu; 7.5 cm (image). Gift of Zhang Hongtu (2009-19.40)
